ygData.subject: Re: Problem compiling HyperNEAT 2.6 under Mac OS X
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks, that really helped a lot. I just had to make a similar edit on line 39 of Hypercube_NEAT/include/HCUBE_Boost.h and it was good to go! Dimitar

Thanks, that really helped a lot.
I just had to make a similar edit on line=
 39 of Hypercube_NEAT/include/HCUBE_Boost.h and it was good to go!

Dimitar=


--- In neat@yahoogroups.com, "jgmath2000" <jgmath2000@...> wrote:
>
> Hey=
 Dimitar,
> 
> In more recent versions of the boost library, they broke out=
 the uniform_int and uniform_smallint classes.
> 
> Change "uniform_smallin=
t" to "uniform_int" on line 16 to correct this error.
> 
> Jason G.
> 
> --=
